moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Twister
moves.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.

moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Bubble
moves.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' Speed stats.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Camouflage
moves.description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

moves.name: Poison Tail
moves.description: The user hits the target with its tail. It may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Water Pulse
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

moves.name: Aqua Tail
moves.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

moves.name: Sludge Bomb
moves.description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Hydro Pump
moves.description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Dragon Tail
moves.description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

moves.name: Twister
moves.description: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing team. It may also make targets flinch.
